about_the_game:
Welcome to Sixth Force, a family-friendly co-op action-adventure where story and gameplay blend seamlessly. Step into the roles of Michael, a workaholic programmer, and his son Thomas, a rebellious budding graffiti artist. Both unexpectedly find themselves trapped in a simulation alongside their quirky AI companion, KIKI, and bound by the mysterious Sixth Force. Together, you’ll navigate their evolving relationship, master unique abilities, and tackle the challenges of a surreal digital world.

WHAT’S INCLUDED IN THIS DEMO

This demo version lets you experience the first two levels of Sixth Force, showcasing the unique bond mechanic and the emotional journey of the story:

• The Bond Mechanic: A glowing link between the characters keeps them together, promoting synchronized movement and puzzle-solving.

• Telekinesis: Use this ability to solve puzzles, move objects, and interact with the dynamic environment.

• Amazing Simulations: Explore stunning and surreal digital worlds filled with intricate details and immersive environments.

SHARED-SCREEN CO-OP GAMEPLAY

Designed for two players side-by-side, the bond mechanic fosters cooperative interdependence, daring you to team up and communicate to overcome every challenge.

IMPORTANT NOTES

• Two controllers required: The game is designed for shared-screen co-op.

• Preview of the full game: This demo offers a glimpse into the story, mechanics, and atmosphere of Sixth Force.

Wishlist Sixth Force on Steam and be the first to try the full adventure upon release!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 14 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 14 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

name: Sixth Force Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 Sandy Bridge Dual Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 Sandy Bridge Dual Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: A heartfelt co-op action-adventure for two players. Play as a workaholic programmer and his creative son, trapped in a simulation with their quirky AI companion. Master unique abilities and tackle the challenges of a surreal digital world together. May the Sixth Force be with you!
